verbose_text: Based on the relative amount of CTGF that bound to alpha v beta 1 compared to alpha 2 beta 1 or alpha 5 beta 1, as well as the relative levels of expression of the alpha v and beta 1 integrin subunits compared to the other alpha and beta subunits, alpha v beta 1 appears to be the primary integrin heterodimer involved in osteoblast adhesion to CTGF.
